like: I appreciate the depth and quality of contacts in the database. For a small organization like mine, this is a really helpful resource to kick start our database marketing.
dislike:
Sometimes I thinks some of my saved search parameters don't get saved, requiring me to reconfigure searches from scratch.

Also -- if I want to download a validated list of contacts, it would be great if I could set the quantity of validated contacts, and get exactly that. As it is, I configure a list, and tell the system I want a particular number of contacts -- and then say I want ones with validated email addresses. I get some subset of the original number -- no telling how many I'm going to get. Would be better if I could say I want "x" number of contacts with validated emails, and get exactly that.

like:

like:
Finding leads in my industry is tough, so UpLead's been a lifesaver. The best parts are definitely:

- Those detailed filters: I don't waste time on generic lists. I can target people by their exact job title, the kind of company they work for, the whole nine yards.
- Knowing emails are good: Bounced emails are the worst. UpLead checking them beforehand means my campaigns actually reach people.
- The price is right: Some tools charge a fortune, but UpLead gets the job done without breaking the bank. That's huge for my small business.
dislike:
Honestly, there's not much to complain about, but a couple of things:

- Info isn't always perfect: The email check is awesome, but sometimes the contact details themselves are a bit old. I have to double-check those occasionally.
- Needs more connections: If it worked with a few more of my other sales tools, life would be even easier. Not a biggie, though.
problems solved:
UpLead solves a ton of those annoying lead gen problems that used to make me want to pull my hair out:

- Finding the right fit: You know how it is – my industry is niche, so generic lead lists were useless. Now I can zero in on the right job titles and companies.
- No more bad emails: Ugh, bounced emails are the worst. UpLead's real-time check saves me so much frustration.
- Budget-friendly: Some tools cost an arm and a leg! UpLead is way more affordable, especially for a smaller company like mine.

The best part? I get that time back. Less time wasted on bad data means more time for actually building relationships with potential clients.

like:
The most helpful feature of UpLead is actually it's lack of features.  Most other lead vendors I've worked with over the last 20 years offer so much in terms of search criteria that the process is either such a hassle to navigate that it's not worth it, or I am forced to pay for features I have no interest in using.

The search features are intuitive once you know what you are looking for.  Identifying, downloading and then importing new leads into my CRM is a breeze.

like:
Precise targeting: UpLead's search options allow for very precise targeting of potential business partners.

Better tailored messaging: With the ability to focus on the most relevant prospects, UpLead users can create more targeted and effective messaging.

Increased audience interest: By focusing on the most relevant prospects, users can increase the likelihood of generating interest and engagement from their audience.

Time-saving: UpLead's search options and filtering capabilities can help users save time by eliminating irrelevant prospects.

Comprehensive data: UpLead provides a comprehensive set of data on each prospect, including contact information, company details, and more, which can help users better understand their target audience.

Integration with other tools: UpLead can be integrated with other sales and marketing tools, such as CRMs and email automation software, to streamline workflows and enhance the overall sales process.
dislike:
Limited data accuracy: While UpLead does its best to maintain accurate data, there may be errors or outdated information in their database. This can lead to wasted time and resources when trying to connect with a lead who is no longer with the company or has inaccurate contact information.

Limited coverage: UpLead's database is not as comprehensive as some other lead generation tools. This means that some potential leads may not be included in their database, limiting your pool of potential prospects.
problems solved: UpLead is solving the problem of finding and targeting specific business leads by providing a comprehensive database of verified contacts with advanced search options. This benefits us by allowing us to reach out to potential business partners more effectively and efficiently, resulting in better tailored messages and increased interest from the audience. Additionally, the platform saves us time and resources by eliminating the need for manual research and verification of leads, allowing us to focus on other aspects of our business.

like:
Update: the contact data was ok but I'm not a fan of the way they do business.

Great quality data / emails. Very accurate information. Bounce rates for our initial campaign was in the mid single digits. The search and filtering is easy to use. The cost is reasonable.
dislike:
Updating my review as I was very disappointed in how they handled our renewal. No notification at all - just a charge to my credit card. This is despite the fact that we had many contacts remaining on our prior year engagement. When I complained (several times) they finally reversed the charge but (seemingly out of spite) closed my account and removed my access to the contacts I hadn't used. I'd avoid using this company.

The search and filter criteria could be way more precise. The number of verified emails exporting is a fraction of the total in the list (which can be seen as a positive as it only gives you high quality data but half the list doesn't export).
problems solved: Sales and marketing outreach. Awareness. Lead generation.

like:
For companies with over 10 employees, Uplead does a good job of identifying key people and basic contact information for the company.  I have also found that company emails to be reliable approx. 75% of the time and cell phone numbers approx. 30% of the time.

Price-point...Uplead is affordable for my company.  I was using Zoom Info before and it was very expensive.   I would be willing to pay more for our Uplead subscription for better cell phone accuracy.
dislike: The add-on exports contact information as a 'Contact' in Zoho CRM instead of as a 'Lead'.  A contact in Zoho is essentially a constumer with an account assigned to it.
problems solved: Helps us track down potential customer and investors.

like:
We are a small company, and UpLead is a perfect fit.
I can easily pull up a list of potential clients and either prospect directly from UpLead and import qualified candidates as I find them or build a list I can download later. Managing your credits is easy, so you stay within your budget.
dislike: I have nothing negative to say about the product other than that I wish I had more features. More business intelligence would be helpful, and I'll pay for that module as soon as we grow a little. The product is priced right for us right now.
problems solved: Accurate information and finding new prospects within our criteria.

like:
Upside allows me to target companies and individuals with simple but effective filters. Besides finding new opportunities it allows me to easily make contact through verified emails.
Using the system is easy and the way the system handles data is all geared to making it easy- to find what you have done and to recall data easily.
The system allows me to do a search and find a prospect list and to then draw down data as I want to use it. I am in complete control.
dislike: Nothing so far. Everything works as it should. I suppose more data would be beneficial in some locations outside of the USA and Europe but apart from that there is nothing to dislike.
problems solved: Few data systems are as comprehensive in the USA and Europe as Uplead. It allows me to feel confident that I can search and find the people I need to contact in almost any business sector.

like: UpLead has allowed me to build a solid CRM database over time with its integration into HubSpot.  It is very easy to use, and the support (via chat) is very responsive.  We really liked that the cost was a fraction of some of the others we looked at, and that you could do it on a month-to-month basis...if you are willing to wait for your credits on a monthly basis.
dislike: Sometimes the system can be a bit slow or have some "hiccups" when moving from screen to screen.  I've noticed some very aged contacts and duplicates, but I haven't had too many issues there as I do a lot of data vetting and pick and choose on my credit utilization.
problems solved: I started with a blank CRM instance and needed to build out a contact database for sales and marketing efforts.  With UpLead, I built searches and lists based on industry, region, and revenue and honed in on contacts based on title and seniority.  From there, I was able to utilize their HubSpot integration to build up my CRM company and contact information over time based on my monthly credit allowance.

like: The depth of the Database is great, I have searched people and companies across North America and found the information very reliable.  Other features are the company information, number of employees, annual sales, products sold, SIC codes, markets they are involved, all very useful information.  You can develop search lists so you can use that information again in the future.  They have more information than I currently use but I find new features within the program I use
dislike: Some of the contacts are not up to date, I only have company information (email and cell phone) and would be nice to have more personal contact information.  I'd like to see stronger search engines as sometimes the information is there but you need to try different ways to find it.  Not a deal breaker for sure
problems solved: finding business /client contact information faster than other methods

like: I like that I can access email and mobile phone numbers.  UpLead is easy to use. This has helped me greatly when prospecting.
dislike: Sometimes data is old or people have left companies
problems solved: It is helping me make contact with the correct prospects at my accounts.

like: The search tools of UpLead gives the opportunity to target the specific possible business partners. dislike: The database of UpLead is not as extensive as those of some other lead generation programs. This implies that a portion of your pool of prospective customers may not be in their database.
problems solved: UpLead is resolving the issue of locating and focusing on specific business leads by offering a vast database of verified contacts with sophisticated search features,This helps us since it makes it possible for us to communicate with potential business partners more successfully and effectively, which results in better-tailored communications and higher audience interest. The platform also frees up our time and resources by removing the need for manual lead verification and investigation, allowing us to concentrate on other areas of our organization

like: dashboard was very helpful but felt they could have had better data
dislike: Not as good as competitors, such as cognism
problems solved: Solving lack of access to content, so getting mobiles is helpful but I could have definitely had a better experience

like: I like how the UI is simple and easy to use, and how emails are validated for deliverability before being downloaded. I really enjoy how 38 of the 4,800 purchased contacts were automatically judged to be incomplete or undeliverable and changed before download! The greeting and follow-up emails were concise, pleasant, and welcoming. There was nothing "over the top" about any of the texts or the frequency.
dislike: I'm not sure how the filtering could be made better because you have so many search criteria and options.
problems solved: Finding high-quality, specifically targeted leads is a critical problem that UpLead addresses. Since I've been purchasing lead lists for almost 20 years, UpLead has always been the simplest to search, choose, buy, and download. We don't have to spend time sorting through data because the entire procedure is simple from beginning to end. We have had the sorting done by UpLead.

like: The real-time email verification brings a lot of certainty, because I know the emails are going to the correct recipient. Most lead lists don't have this feature in my experience, and when an email comes back bad it takes a lot of effort to get the company to reimburse it. However, Uplead has a responsive chat feature, and they will send you credits for each lead that's bad, even after the real-time verification.
dislike: Sometimes it's difficult to find particular individuals, and not all professionals are in the database. It takes a bit of working with the system to get acquainted with how to fully use the seach feature, but there are chat agents available at any time to help as well, and once you get used to it it's pretty fun.
problems solved: It solves the problem of quickly and conveniently finding the type of people I'm looking for: CPAs and high level business owners. Instead of doing a Yelp search, I can categorize by title and executive level, and specifically by company revenue.

like: My favorite thing about Uplead is the ability to filter by intent data. It's so helpful when trying to target prospects to know if any of them are already actively engaged with your (or a competitors!) products and services. It's the most useful feature of the list building capabilities in my humble opinion.
dislike: While most of the data appears valid, like any B2B database, we have found some errors or outdated information. It's important to be diligent and check your lists to ensure accuracy no matter what.
problems solved: Uplead is helping us reach audiences that we otherwise wouldn't have access to. The information it provides about each lead helps us understand more about that person's job role, education, and other prime data points for connecting with them effectively. We use the information from Uplead to reach out to prospects about free events that may interest them and be of use to them. It helps both sides because the lead learns about us and what we can do to help them, and we make a new connection.

like:
Best parts of UpLead:
- So many different ways to filter when searching for contacts
- Accessible pricing options that we can use now as a startup, and that we can grow with
- Amount of information available on the companies the contacts work for
- Easy to view all contacts within a given organization
- Easy to save and download results
dislike:

problems solved:
Finding the right contacts within B2B potential prospects.

like: Uplead is a great platform for those looking for a powerful yet easy-to-use lead management system. Additionally, their streamlined reporting system provides an easy way to track which leads have been granted and which have been lost. By integrating seamlessly with a range of popular CRM solutions, Uplead makes lead management a breeze. Highly recommended!
dislike: I feel that the ability to access industry-specific manager is powerful but I am on the lower tear and not sure that the higher tear is worth the additional money.

problems solved: UpLead helps me find the contact information for leads I wouldn't be able to reach out to otherwise. Even better, it provides avenues for discovering new leads.

like:
Uplead eliminates cold calls! It's intent data feature is my favorite because no longer is the question "do you want my product?" you already know! Every interaction with a prospect is warm and if you are a true salesperson, it increases your conversion rate to nearly 50%.
The best part is the competitive pricing, Uplead has the best priced product in the intent data market as well as the most accurate. I highly recommend for anyone who hates cold calls, and is looking for a solution to even the playing field.
dislike: The only issue I experienced was some of the features of the annual subscription were not available for thier monthly counterparts. Yet disappointing, completely understandable with the integrations and data that is offered.
problems solved: Uplead has softened my approach. It has created a mindset of "microwaved" instead of "cold". It has helped clear out a lot of the grey areas of prospecting. The free trial provided 5 free leads and I was able to convert 2, not bad huh?

like: The month-to-month option was a perfect fit for our current needs. Selecting prospects by relevant targeting and saving both the search and desired prospects list is simple and convenient. problems solved: Target Lead Gen source nationally by Location, Industry, Size and Title. I can keep feeding my Cold Email campaigns with fresh targeted prospects.

like: After using almost all databases on the market I come back to UpLead permanently as I find it more effective and valued for my money. On the other hand, it doesn't have any search limitations like others. So that you can search as much as you can and value your money. The ease of use is the main strength of UpLead. Just using title or names you can get your desired information. I find here all the relevant information for my business.

problems solved: My business keeps expanding and I get more leads through it. UpLead helps me to get genuine and useful leads and thus I feel more organized and confident.

like: Easy to use platform with transparent pricing!

problems solved: UpLead is helping my team generate leads and data we otherwise wouldn't have been able to uncover.

like: Real and qualified data are the first and foremost requirement for my business and UpLead is the continuous provider of that data. This smart tool has a real time verification process to make it more effective and efficient too. I like the responsive chat feature option the most. It solves half of the problem.
dislike: Sometimes it is hard to find particular problems as I love to work with this software. But the chat agent needs to be more active and responsive. They are a little bit slow and I think they need to be faster.
problems solved: This software solves my problems and exceeds my expectations. The different types and categories help me to find my desired clients conveniently and quickly. I can easily find my demanded list here through the title and save it for further use.

like: Uplead is a great source for contact information and intent information.  The verification process Uplead uses  lessens the chances we are getting old or outdated contact information.

like: building lists is a breeze if you know who your target market is. The enrichment tools are easy to use. The data you receive is pretty accurate. The customer service is an A+. You can quickly have your questions answered via chat.
dislike: Not much to say. As far as I can tell, Under the contact search, it is not possible to search for a specific contact. But rather you can get a list of contacts based on search criteria.
problems solved: The product I offer can be sold to any business prioritizing outbound prospecting. That is a lot of companies. Searching for the specific persona that typically buys my product is a huge time saver.

like: UpLead is the software which I was looking for a long time. It has all the facilities that I need the most. First of all, real time email verification makes the contact list more specific and authentic. So a very low chance of getting email bounce back. The chat feature is amazing. It not only sends the credits for each lead but also cares for your problems.
dislike: Sometimes finding a particular individual is a big mess and takes more time than usual. I think this part needs more improvement. Although chat agents are so friendly and helpful to solve any problems.
problems solved: I think UpLead solves problems of searching leads conventionally and swiftly. It comes with the search filter where you can categorize your desired leads by titles and executive level.

like: It is an easy way to gain contacts and their information by specific industry. You can filter down by many other criteria as well so your lookups can be very focused. Downloading to excel is quick and easy.
dislike: Sometimes the email is not available when oyou find a specific contact.
problems solved: Being able to generate a number of prospective buyers quickly.

dislike: It is tough sometimes to run lists because once you select contacts, it runs a test and then eliminates bad contacts.  This is good, but it is tough to know how many credits you have when running a list.

like: Very easy to use, day one, very easy to search and find contacts.
dislike: Like most providers, not all emails correct, not a lot of personal phone numbers.

like: You can't be an expert in everything, and I use out-of-the-box ways to research data. So I appreciate that UpLead's live chat is typically available when I'm searching and need clarification or, if they're offline, they get back to me quickly. I do research on behalf of my clients, so support speed is important to me. The data also seems more accurate than when I used Seamless.
dislike: There are still gaps in the data coverage and in some categories there are hundreds of contacts per company, but not many companies in the results. I also have had to download results multiple times to get all the contacts in the search; the validation process apparently takes multiple tries. I *guess* I appreciate that they don't add unverified data (like a lot of AI-driven platforms do), but then I have to cross check numbers to see how far off I am from the universe I'm trying to research.
problems solved: Most often I use the data to "reverse engineer" a prospect and see if the target industry I'm looking for matches the lead's. Or to find job functions that are typically harder to identify. I'm usually only creating lists of a few hundred at a time, so I know what I'm getting is focused and accurate. My clients have had good prospecting success with my lists.

like: The platform makes it much easier for me to gain internal contacts through whatever company I may be calling on. It also simplifies my searches so I can contact the correct individuals within an organization.
dislike: The main thing I dislike about the platform is the outdated phone numbers or emails of contacts I am trying to reach. I've had experiences where I reach out to someone whom I believe is working for a company and they are not associated with the business anymore.
problems solved: The main thing Uplead is assisting me on is spreading the word about our company to the correct types of contacts/businesses. We are relatively new in our industry so it's extremely important people know who we are and what we do.

like: I would recommend UpLead to a friend or colleague. UpLead is a compelling and user-friendly lead generation and sales intelligence platform. The platform has top-notch, valuable features that make it easy to find and connect with potential customers. UpLead also offers great pricing plans and discounts, making it even more affordable. Excellent lead is an ideal platform for any business looking to generate leads and increase sales.

like: UpLead is easy to use and allows multiple handy ways to filter down many potential prospects to a manageable and relevant list. Various pricing plans are well thought out and can fit any budget, allowing for scalability as the business grows.
dislike: We don't have any complaints at this time. UpLead is serving our current needs very well.
problems solved: UpLead helps us identify our B2B prospects in a repeatable and straightforward manner. Generating marketing target lists is a breeze and the ability to save and reuse searches in the future is a significant time saver.

like:
I love the clean, easy-to-use interface and that emails are checked for deliverability before downloading.  I REALLY like that 38 of the 4,800 contacts purchased were automatically determined to be incomplete or undeliverable, and the system replaced them before download!  So, 4,838 contacts delivered.  That's a nice touch.

The welcome and follow-up emails were clear, warm and friendly.  None of the messages, nor was the frequency "over the top".  Communication is subjective, but that was just right for me.
dislike: The filtering seemed a bit clunky, but you offer so many search parameters and filters I'm not sure how this could be improved.
problems solved: UpLead solves a significant problem in finding quality, narrowly targeted leads.  I've been buying lead lists for nearly 20 years, and UpLead has been the easiest to search, select, purchase and download.  The entire process is easy from start to finish, so we can get to work instead of sifting data.  UpLead already did the sifting for us.

like: The support is very easy to schedule and knowledgeable to make the leaarning curve a bit less pain staking.

like: Easy to learn and beneficial for marketing and other business
dislike: Nothing I can think of, it's pretty easy to use

like: UpLead has been a game-changer for us (a nonprofit) in seeking corporate support. Having info for various contacts allows us to strategize our approach. It seems like corporations are shielding that information like never before; UpLead gives us a chance to get past that with far less effort than we have had to use in the past. I really like that the credits roll-over. When our new CRM conversation got delayed by 6 months, I didn't have to worry I was going to lose those prospective contacts.
dislike: The only downside we have experienced is sometimes it's harder to get VERIFIED information than would be ideal.
problems solved: Finding who to approach for conversations. I can track several new gifts -- including a new multi-year grant - directly back to UpLead contact information and the prospecting that is possible because of that.

like: UpLead has been a great system to use. Being able to search for target customers in one location and also search for companies in my general market. A great tool for someone new to sales and prospecting
dislike: I have not come across anything I dislike, as this has been a massive help in my sales career
problems solved: I was having a problem connecting with customers due to only cold calling. And thanks to UpLead, I have made connections with decision-makers where I was not having that much success. Thanks to UpLead I am now booking more appointments.

like: The upside of using UpLead is that it produces results and is straightforward to use compared to the other platforms I've used. Another good thing about it is that it is cheaper and more efficient than other platforms I've used. I would recommend Uplead to my colleagues because I've not been disappointed  with the results I'm getting

like:

UpLead also has good filters, it's easy to navigate and has a brilliant design. In comparison with other platforms, UpLead offers really good prices. It's affordable and worth it. In the beginning, I didn't know if cold emailing would work for me, so I was pretty happy about the month-to-month contract.

problems solved: It's challenging to get contact information for prospecting in sales without services like UpLead. Having verified leads to feed into your prospecting pipeline, importing contacts directly into your CRM, and verifying emails for every contact are very valuable for sales jobs.

like: They have an ok amount of data and the UI is easy to use and view.

- Their search capabilities are lacking, as I try to filter out the criteria but does not seem to show what I am looking for.

- Beware of their trial period and what you select as your payment option as they do not allow for refunds whatsoever.
problems solved: Uplead barely solves the problem that I am trying to solve which is building a list of quality leads. At most, I use it to verify the data I find in another sales intelligence tool, but I still, find the data unreliable.

like: I love how easy it is to use.  We often search to fill difficult roles, locations, and even industries.  Uplead makes it easy to run a search in just a few minutes.
dislike: Sometimes I'd like to receive a few more results, but all in all, it's been an excellent tool for us with accurate results.
problems solved: Sourcing for talent outside of Linkedin in particular locations and industries.

like: Its user-friendly interface with multiple search options makes life easier to get quality leads. Another feature is that I can upload my data list and get the contact details of the companies in my list. Filters available to search options are another best feature of this software. It makes list-building super easy.
dislike: Nothing much, the only I didn't find is they do not offer a free version after the trial period.
problems solved: Uploads help me generate quality leads for my clients according to their business requirements and also give me an opportunity to find new clients and offer them my freelance virtual services. like: The first and most important item to me is the quality of the contacts.  When I send batches of 200 emails at a time, i get a 73% open rate on average.  My record was 88.4% opens from the contacts i fetched.  Bounce rate was < .01% which was superb as well.    The second most important aspect was "are these really contacts in the company and position as listed" , and I found them ALL to be an exact match on the title and company name.  Over the last 25 years I've easily spent $250k  on finding leads and/or contacts for our services.  This is the only one I've found that has true, accurate, and [most important] current/up-to-date contacts.   I can't speak any more positively about UpLead because their quality has been absolutely flawless.  Customer service is quick to respond and I've yet to run into any issues.  Bravo upLead, bravo.
dislike: Nothing.  The service has been working perfectly for us since day 1.  We have occasional questions about functionality and their service department answers the questions completely, and fast.
problems solved: Finding quality contacts to promote our services to.   Quality and current is key.   Allows us to be more productive when conducting our marketing and sales efforts due to the quality of the leads.

like: Love the monthly subscription model, love the team functionality, love the customer support, love the recent addition of mobile numbers, and love the CRM integration.

I would love to simply check the email's status (without unlocking and revealing the email address) before investing time into researching the lead before unlocking it.
problems solved: I'm finding quality leads for my small business search. They make finding emails and verifying them extremely easy. Additionally, their API helped me create a scalable process for my outbound campaign.

like: The UI is pretty intuitive, for the most part. It's pretty easy to target lead lists based on specific titles, and other demographic data
dislike:
The data quality is sketch. You generate a lead list of 100 and only 30-40 are verified....so if you have 100 credits, you have to go through the process 10 times to use up your credits.

The billing, terms are obnoxious. You have to cancel early and lose credits. Avoid the annual term at all costs.

like: As a user of many different database tools, ZoomInfo, Discover.org, Lusha, I found UpLead's user interface and search features easier to navigate and more intuitive to use. I jumped right in and created lists of targeted contacts and companies that fit our ICP for engagement.

like:
UpLead comes in at a tiny fraction of the cost of the "big" data providers out there. Our clients love our ability to deliver lists and contacts in minutes, at minimal cost.

Data quality is generally good. I'd say it's something like an 80% hit rate, though that takes into account an absolute TON of "accept all" email addresses. For better or worse, though, that's the way of the world.

The customer service team is great. An intern mistake cost us a TON of credits. They understood and reimbursed, no questions asked.
dislike:
A built-in company name -> URL converter would be extremely useful. We need to use third-party tools now, which adds effort and expense.

Industry search could be a bit more intuitive. If you have a SIC or NAICS code (or a knowledge of the technical industry title) it's great. If it's a prospect segment that goes across multiple parts of SIC segment, things get trickier. At that point, you're running some pretty draconian negatives.

Company revenue (as seems to be standard with these types of data systems) is often inflated quite a bit. That's to be expected, but it does take one potentially available filter out of the equation.
problems solved:
Our clients always need specialized lists. UpLead lets us provide them quickly and easily.

The ability to directly enrich or create records in Nimble is important. We use that CRM, as do several of our clients. Direct integration (without the need for a spreadsheet interstitial) is key. On the spreadsheet side, the completeness is excellent.

like: Really enjoy the layout of UpLead and I feel good about the larger companies that use it.
dislike: Wish I had a little more contacts in my metro area.
problems solved: Lead generation for one. Also, the ability to cross-reference with client competitors to go prospect them as well.

like:
Uplead makes it very easy to find industries and target companies by use of different technologies. Making a list of companies filtering for size, industry and location is a breeze with the layout. Once you've found your target companies, its very easy to find specific titles and add them to a customized list. Our company has a CRM integration with salesforce dot com so pushing your new leads over to work with them is incredibly seamless.

I really like the fact that once you try to unlock an email it is tested at time of unlock. If the email is found to be invalid you get your credit back. This is way better than the alternative of scraping the email, sending it off into cyberspace and then getting an Undeliverable or worse yet not receiving an mailer daemon & just wondering  where  your outreach sitting.
dislike: There are a few times  I've ran into some stale information and I don't mean by like a couple of years, I mean like a decade or more. It doesn't happen very often but, its like any other database of information - not necessarily a huge knock.
problems solved: I am getting a lot more traction having an easy way to sort and find customers that are in our lane of targeting. This is done through all of the information that uplead provides. I find that my combining a targeted approach of choosing who I'm going after AND tailored message has worked best.

like: UpLead has been vital to the success to the success of my sales efforts. like: Uplead has several features to narrow or expand business lead searches by type of industry. Designations of leads provide intelligence into operating models of companies, and help channelize inquiries with good precision.  Options of company search and contact search offer convenience and speed.  Within industry, the sub-categories help scale and limit searches without overwhelming the database.  Contact searches are simplified and easy to navigate.
dislike: Searching by role is sometimes cumbersome. For example, when searching for leadership roles in Engineering (VP, Director, Manager), it is difficult to just search "Engineering" and expect those roles to show up. Some of the contacts are not downloadable, indicating that UpLead is not validating and purging them frequently. Sometimes no contacts for a company can be downloaded. Also, sometimes emails sent to the downloaded leads bounce back, indicating the person might no longer be with the company. Before downloading the lead, I often check their LinkedIn status to get confidence in the validity of the lead. Perhaps, UpLead could add the option for users to report invalid leads.
problems solved: The key challenge for me was to generate industry-wide leads to develop a comprehensive and large audience for advertising business services of my company. UpLead not only made it possible, but also easy and straight-forward.

like:
I really enjoy Uplead's ease of use. It's very intuitive and makes it easy to find information about potential clients and companies. The contact data is also up-to-date, which is a BIG plus for a prospecting tool like this. Inaccurate data doesn't make sales and business development reps more efficient, so this is key. I've found Uplead to be more accurate than other prospecting tools.

The detailed information about each contact helps sales reps to make an informed selection when choosing to spend a credit to unlock a contact's email. Additionally, Uplead verifies emails and gives you the result with the option to accept or decline the lead without using a credit. This allows you to know that you're using credits on emails that will reach an actual person. The combination of detailed information and email verification really helps you maximize credits and make sure you are getting the best value for each credit.

They also have quite a lot of filtering options. I really like the fact that they have a technology filter. These deeper kinds of filters add to the value of Uplead and help our sales and marketing teams better target prospects with more relevant and effective messaging.

A lot of quality prospect tools are way too expensive for small businesses that can't invest tens of thousands of dollars. Uplead is the prospecting tool that you can afford with the data quality you need. If you're ready to make your prospecting efficient and affordable, Uplead is the perfect tool.
dislike:
Sometimes the filters will exclude contacts that they shouldn't. For example, if you make one of your filters US contacts only and the contacts don't have country information but do have state information (i.e. contacts that have their location set to Ohio, but not Ohio, US) will be excluded. You have to play with the filters a little to understand what level of exclusion works best for you. It takes a little tinkering, which does take time, but the information is accurate so that's better than inaccurate data.

I love the technology filter, but it would be great to have more technologies available in this filter. I'd also like to know how Uplead knows what technologies a company is using.
problems solved:
We are using Uplead for: prospect and account level research, identification, and prioritization, as well as expansion and up-selling/cross-selling in current accounts. We run lead generation and content syndication campaigns separate from Uplead, but then we use Uplead to verify the leads we get and also find more contacts at that account.

So far, Uplead has been great at meeting all these needs. Definitely cut down time spent on these activities.

like: Whatever criteria I searched there, I got the contacts related to that. I liked the search option mostly. It has everything we need to narrow down the list as per our requirement.

like: UpLead provides numerous, powerful, and granular search parameters in a reasonably common-sense interface. The contacts themselves are not only qualified for technical deliverability (something that required other third-party tools and subscriptions at subsequent stages), the contacts themselves are surprisingly receptive and essentially the building blocks on which deep, long-lasting relationships have been able to be forged.
dislike: Some filters restrict keywords to only 1 parameter. In many cases for instance, I've found the need to search for a keyword in one search parameter and another as a sub-defining query.
problems solved: Quality contacts pure and simple. It's not enough to have quality emails alone, we ultimately want warm, receptive leads. While this is a big ask for any lead source, of course, I have nevertheless found this with UpLead in spades.

like: I can search most C suite suspects, retrieve both emails and phone numbers in minutes.  Not only that, while searching you will come across other suspects as well.  (Suspects being potential leads but not yet qualified to be a prospect).

problems solved: I am able to get rite to the decision maker and start the process.

like: Our favorite feature is the ability to search for leads based on "Technology" allowing us to reverse engineer and find prospect who may be using a competitor or integration partner. dislike: There is very little.  But if I had to be nit-picky, its a little hard to find previously exported leads.
problems solved: Generating a fresh list of highly relevant prospects that we can warm up via cold outreach.

like: Comprehensive data including the tech stack, very easy to navigate, email validation, and it is priced fairly at every level, even single user.

problems solved: I am able to easily identify a market sector and reduce the search results to a specific geography and then find contacts by role or title. like: Ease of use and simple identification of the contact type I need. I first tried ZoomInfo, and it was outrageously priced. Higher than I had read about on the Internet. For this reason, I found UpLead which seems to be a reasonable alternative at a tremendously lesser cost.
dislike: I have not found anything I disliked specifically with Upload.
problems solved: Avoiding the insanely high cost of ZoomInfo while having access to accurate data. I need access to decision makers and Uplead has so far been a simple alternative while not costing anywhere near some other platforms I have seen.

like: The fact that you are able to connect with key individuals within a company to get your point across/ business done quickly and efficiently. I do enjoy the integration aspect as well as I am new to the marketing side of things. I am able to sync my information to a mail merger (for bulk messaging) because uplead gives me the option to transfer ALL data to an excel sheet.
dislike:
Some emails are not up to date. But I enjoy the fact that they verify this info upon unlocking to keep from a wasted credit. This is something that stood out to me in comparison to other companies.

I wish there was an option to get unlimited/open credits, more of an annually option to increase productivity within my company.

Other than this I am content with this platform.
problems solved: Getting in front of key decision-makers within a company. I can directly contact them without searching the web. I can also find out a quick snippet of the company when doing a search, it helps when conducting a completely general search. I find it hard to differentiate the titles of workers, Uplead outlines there current role/ title to ensure I am speaking with the correct individual.

like: The aesthetic look of the website is modern but I'd rather have leads that accurate. I did not pay for a good looking website but quality leads.
dislike: We moved from D&B leads which we learned our lesson. We were stuck with a one year contract. D&B had horrible leads with inaccurate contacts and emails that bounce all the time. That being said when we joined Uplead I thought we would try for a month. Well, it seems that their leads are just as bad, I'm a business owner so I was under the impression this was billed on a month to month meaning you needed to physically approve payments. Apparently, we got billed for 3 months. I was very upset so I contacted customer service and guess what!! They are bad people!! If you stop auto-bill you lose all of the credits you paid for. Right when I thought you can't get worst than D&B, Uplead really took this lead. Very disappointed with this company. I will be filling a complaint with the BB and US consumer affairs.
problems solved: They did not resolve my issue

like: Easy to navigate search criteria and ability to upload to CRM, Salesforce. Mike and Russell are very helpful and responsive to my questions and to address our needs
dislike: We are a fairly new user of Up Lead and it is currently satisfying our needs

like:

like: UpLead has unmatched customer service. Everyone is so nice and helpful. They're extremely patient and understanding as well. When I was in the first stages of the trial I ran out of tokens, but was still unsure if I wanted to invest in the service. Without hesitation, an UpLead representative loaded more tokens to my account, so I was able to confirm my belief in their services. Also, their services have provided us with hundreds of contacts that we've been able to turn into leads. Also, the data that UpLead provides is up to date, which saves us time from reaching out to inactive email addresses. The UpLead service is extremely easy to use as well. I'm not the most tech savy person, but this software is extremely easy to use, and if you are confused at all, you can just ask the helpful customer support staff.
dislike: One thing I think UpLead can do better is increase the size of their overall database. I think if any of their competitors has the upperhand on UpLead, it is because of their database size.
problems solved: UpLead has been instrumental in our research process which includes creating customer leads in our industry. This has helped us turn those leads into sales, which has allowed us to beat our lead targets for the 3rd week in a row. The simplistic application has made out data research simple, affordable and extremely successful.

like: My team and I use UpLead very often to find contacts and companies during our trade shows. UpLead is a great easy to use website that allows you to find everything you need very quickly. Also, UpLead has the best customer service support team. While in the trial stage, I asked support for a few more credits to show my boss. UpLead provided me with the credits within 20 minutes.
dislike: Sometimes I needed to search a name a couple of times before a result showed up. This was not a major problem, but it would take often 3 searches for some names to show up. This did not happen all the time, but was annoying when trying to fill out a contact list quickly.
problems solved: UpLead has made my job so much easier finding companies and employees we are looking for in certain locations. My company searches for certain types of users, and UpLead has provided us with a quick and easy way to access these people.

like:
Working with UpLead is intuitive, but like most prospecting tools, knowing the search criteria goes a long way for the best results. That said, the amount of accurate information I receive for contacts is extraordinary.

Customer support ~ my rep is Russel ~ is quick, concise, and not overbearing. I think UpLead is a hidden gem.

What surprised me was how accurate the results were. Companies with a myriad of contacts are listed as a result and, when you select one, you're given a list of all contacts within that company. This simplifies my efforts immeasurably.
dislike:
One complaint is the inability to search by a specific radius around a city, metro area, or zip code. A quick workaround is searching by county. May have to fine tune the results, but it solves my issue.

Also, although UpLead integrates with many CRM platforms, the one, our company, uses isn't among them. Luckily, my customer support representative, Russel, provided a quick workaround.
problems solved:
I was recently hired into a company with virtually no marketing department. The website is worse than zero and so are many other facets. One of the duties assigned to me is lead generation. I introduced the idea to management and used UpLead as an example. I gave them a no BS objective overview of the features/advantages/benefits and used the free credits to illustrate how effective the tool is for prospecting.

Although my initial focus is bringing our website into 2019 for the very short future, UpLead is the primary tool for helping us grow!

like: The real time Organic Vertical Contact ability.
dislike: When I find something I let the community know.

dislike: It would be nice for their to be somewhat easier tracking of leads already seen but *not* downloaded. But this is very minor.

like: I get to control the parameters and receive exactly the list I need in order to make significant return on my investment.
dislike: Nothing. My experience has been wonderful so far.

like: I liked the CRM integration that it allows for making seamless transition to contact leads.  I also liked that it allowed you to search multiple industries and titles of employees at once which would give you a much more complete list of people within your search criteria.  I also like the fact that you can look up companies by revenue, # of employees and their industry. being able to identify contacts this way works well for those trying to target a specific market or company size.
dislike: Locating leads and their region.  At times I was provided leads that we not within my physically and geographical location so I would have to sort through the list provided in order to find those contacts which were more relevant to my location.  I am also not a huge fan of the locating feature which does not allow you to sort through the leads based on location.
problems solved: I am looking to increase my lead generation to make more sales - I have realized more genuine contacts with the leads I got form UpLead.  The information provided as far as phone numbers etc. has been spot on within my experience so far.  I have used other services and some numbers are disconnected or the person is no longer with the company so the information I got from UpLead on their contacts was all up to date and very accurate.

like: I like that the data source provides the option to only charge credits for valid emails. Overall, their system is logically laid out that any sales team can adopt.
dislike: Overall the UI could use some work. There are specific things that could potentially be manipulated better with state management and updating the view. I think its clunky how long it takes to search for a filter, then clicking done in-order to retrieve the updated list.
problems solved: Clean Data, we've realized that compared to other data sources they don't charge for bad data.

like: Uplead is as good a lead generator that I have seen but is much for cost effective for my needs.
dislike: Sometimes there are no emails available for a contact, but then there is no charge for the download which is appreciated.
problems solved: We are new to the platform and are still working on integrating it into our regular lead follow ups, but I anticipate that it will work well for us.

like: I think the price is absolutely justifiable for the results that you get. The interface is super easy to use. Search by title and geography are my go-to filters.
dislike: I don't like that there aren't direct numbers for contacts yet..but maybe that is roadmap??
problems solved: I'm able to get company emails and also search for prospects that would otherwise take a while to find through google searches and cold calls.

like: Uplead is very intuitive, easy to learn.  And it has extensive integrations into most CRM solutions. Very easy to use, to learn, you get near immediate results and value.
dislike: Sometimes names and contacts you would think would certainly be found, are not.  So it is not a 100% end-all in prospecting, but it is accurate at least 90% of the time.
problems solved: Finding contact info for specific people within a target firm, and easily importing into Hubspot

like: Excellent customizability of searches by many useful parameters, easy-to-use interface, transparent pricing, no big upfront commitment. Detailed data output.
dislike: Nothing. The experience was excellent from sign up to download of data.

like: Easy to use and find contacts through search.
dislike: Some emails do not work for OEMS and larger companies.

dislike: Lack of phone numbers. Mostly 800 numbers or general corporate numbers.
problems solved: Prospecting

like: When I first got into the freight brokering industry I did all my prospecting my self. Now I can spend almost all of my day strengthening the bonds with my customers rather than hopelessly searching the web for leads and guessing email addresses! Uplead give me the ability to find accurate, high quality leads in a flash!

problems solved: As a freight broker I have two main duties, finding new customers and servicing current customers. Uplead helps me do both better! With Uplead I spend less time prospecting which gives me more time to take care of my customers.

like:
With uplead the interface is easy to use. I loved that fact that I can upload a list of URLs and it spits out contacts from those companies with verified emails.
Other services want you to bring the first and last name of your target and sometime the company name as well.
With uplead, they do all the hard work for you. It is the easiest lead tool to use and by far the most accurate. And for the price, you can't beat it.
I also like the fact that when I signed up one of support girls ( Nicole) checked in with me regularly to see how I was doing. She also offered to pause and extend my trial if I needed more time or if I wasn't ready to start.
I asked her to pause the trial, which she did. When I was ready to get started agin she reinstated my trial so I could continue. I thought that was so thoughtful !

Nothing when it comes to the product itself. But their support could use some work!

I emailed support twice with no response.
I was surprised at how poor their response/support  team was. I still haven't heard back from them.
problems solved: I target tech companies for my business. I needed a platform where I can upload a list of the select startups and get all the contacts and email addresses I need based on the URLs I put in. Uplead did that and then more.

There are two major issues here but they all go back to data quality. The data quality is very poor even when compared to the free alternative, Data.com. During my trial, I noticed two glaring issues.

First, when searching for contacts at a company, I found many contacts that had left the company many years ago. A simple LinkedIn search of that contact confirms this too.

Second, while the Search by Technology feature has a massive list of technologies, it's not accurate. I found that 75-80% of the companies that appeared while searching for a particular technology did not actually have or use it. It's a cool feature but needs major re-tooling.
problems solved: We wanted to improve the quality of our data but haven't really been able to do that.
